Test files for the SQL subcommand.
-- in: employee.csv --
ID, Name,    Age, Salary,  Dept_ID
 1, Abiola,   29, 70000.0,       2
 2, Bolade,   25, 68000.0,       3
 3, Chima,    23, 66000.0,       2
 4, Dinya,    25, 80000.0,       1
 5, Ekon,     27, 85000.0,       1
 6, Feranmi,  22, 65000.0,       2
 7, Ifama,    24, 65000.0,       2

-- in: department.csv --
ID, Dept
 1, DevOps
 2, Engineering
 3, Finance

-- in: join.sql --
SELECT
    Name,Dept
FROM
    employee
    INNER JOIN department ON employee.DEPT_ID = department.ID

-- test: query --
["-q=SELECT SUM(Salary) AS Total FROM employee", "employee.csv"]

-- want: query --
Total
499000

-- test: file --
["-f=join.sql", "department.csv", "employee.csv"]

-- want: file --
Name,    Dept
Abiola,  Engineering
Bolade,  Finance
Chima,   Engineering
Dinya,   DevOps
Ekon,    DevOps
Feranmi, Engineering
Ifama,   Engineering
